attributes.action: Demand full disclosure of the European Audit report into the alleged misuse of public funds by Members of the European Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The European Parliament voted not to publish an Audit report into misuse of taxpayers money in relation to MEP expense claims. The european public have a right to know.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
